text: <@U029AJZHMPV> thanks for posting this here `override_default_style` just sorted me out. Why are these not documented anywhere - or are they? I've come across a few little extra options for tags recently that I cannot find in documentation :confused: frustrating

Why do gradient fields use r g b a properties and everything else is color (hex) and opacity properties. :sob: This makes it so there's no way to inherit theme color field variables into a gradient field defaults, unless there's some hidden way I'm unaware of.
